name: Corgi's adventure
description:
One day a temible fur collector arrive to an island of exotic animals and lock them in cages! A little corgi and his best friend Lidge will have to rescue the other animals! 

Explore the island, solve puzzles and find bones! Let some animals help you with their habilities and discover all the secrets in Corgi’s adventure!

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★

Features
  • Cartoon 3D models
  • A whole island to explore
  • A lot of puzzles to solve
  • A lot of bones to find (collectables)
  • Unlockeable animal habilities
  • Customizable corgi

★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★★
